markdownRemark.excerpt: You can contribute your own content by submitting it as a pull request to the git repository. Full guide to come later! You are also very welcome to contribute…
markdownRemark.html:
You can contribute your own content by submitting it as a pull request to the git repository.

Full guide to come later!

You are also very welcome to contribute to the website itself, whether it’s in terms of development or illustrations and designs.
Contact one of the contributors on the Github repository.

frontmatter.title: Contribute
frontmatter.description: A page detailing how to contribute content to wausoku
